Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22258859]influenza A virus A/WSN/33 H1N1:inhibition of viral replication in MDCK cells(IC50=0.63806 ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: the mechanism whereby FluPep mediates its antiviral effects is likely to involve inhibiting the binding of HA to sialic acid receptors or through interference with the fusion process by blocking protease cleavage.

Literature.Title: A novel family of peptides with potent activity against influenza A viruses.
Literature.Author: Nicol MQ, Ligertwood Y, Bacon MN, Dutia BM, Nash AA.
